document_data.name: Underdark Cookie
document_data.mainbody: '''Underdark cookies''' were dark, rich, and decadent sweet treats from the city of [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.Powers: These [[cookie]]s were known not only to satisfy one's sweet tooth, but also gave a small boost to vitality.
document_data.History: In the mid-to-late-15{{th}} century [[DR]], underdark cookies became available during the extended celebration of [[Liar's Night]], extended into the grand [[Masquerade of Liars]] by the order of Lord Neverember.
